Text:
Good quality. thx for the upload

And a word of respect for the ripper because he uses H264. Let it be an example for all rippers. They should all use H264, x264 or AVC. This is the new generation of video coding. Much better than the divx, xvid,... and other old video coding standards!
I disagree with SaileNav; the ripper has used Advanced Video Codec, which is refused in most standalone DivX players. But thanks anyway, it runs OK in WMP.
